segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming in from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman standing by the sink, focused on drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so absorbed in her task, completely unaware of anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is gushing from the faucet and overflowing the sink right in front of her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over the edge, soaking the cabinets and forming a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already in the water, but she hasn't noticed at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her side, there's a boy climbing on a little stool near the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks wobbly, like it's about to tip backward any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching up to grab cookies from the open cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl is standing nearby, reaching up with her hand open, waiting for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem so excited and sneaky about their little cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside the window looks peaceful, with neat bushes and a path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's funny how calm everything appears out there compared to this mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
